category.name: Classification.Administration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_keylovs_allowing_undefined_values
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of Key LOV IDs (negative integers) that allows the use of temporarily undefined Key LOV entries during the creation and edition of Classification objects. Caution: Adding a key LOV ID to this list can cause data integrity problems.
